title: Get Help from Auntie Ethel
content:
rice for helping us: one of our eyes.

Quest Complete Description

We made a deal with Auntie Ethel, but she couldn't remove the parasite, claiming it was Netherese. If a green hag can't help us, who can? Auntie Ethel died before she could help us. We need to find someone else to remove the parasite. Things turned violent with Auntie Ethel. She isn't happy with us, We left the area before finding out whether the old lady could help us.

Get Help from Auntie Ethel Walkthrough
